title: 122: Bachelor Recap: Episode 8 (Pilot Pete & Hometowns)
itunes:title: 122: Bachelor Recap: Episode 8 (Pilot Pete & Hometowns)
description:
IT’S HOMETOWN TIME, BROADS! The Broads spill some tea and talk in detail about Hannah Ann, Kelsey, Madison, and Victoria’s hometown date. And, wow, Peter made QUITE some decisions! This episode left us on pins and needles for next week’s episode!
